archimate:Contract.name: [Policy] Consistent with Operational Science Configuration Specified by LSST Data Release Board (Contract)
archimate:Contract.documentation: Update reference photometric and astromentric catalogs according to LSST data release board, providing for contingency of rolling back to previous versions of catalogs, during times when it does not effect the operations of L1. A concern is that the templates are expected to be very large, and may not be able to be updated in one day.
